summary: Bitcoin wallet application with transaction sending capabilities
architectural_notes: Using Motoko Bitcoin integration via mo:base/Bitcoin library
Supports both testnet and mainnet Bitcoin networks
Transaction sending returns Result type with txid on success
known_issues: buildTransaction and getTxId helper functions need implementation

new_feature_requests.summary: Implement Bitcoin transaction sending with testnet/mainnet support
Implement buildTransaction helper function for raw transaction creation
Implement getTxId helper function for transaction ID extraction

Implement the sendBitcoin function in the backend main actor that accepts a SendRequest record containing destinationAddress (Text) and amountSatoshis (Nat64), builds a raw Bitcoin transaction, sends it to the testnet network using Bitcoin.send_transaction, and returns a Result<Text, Text> with the transaction ID on success or an error message on failure

Implement the buildTransaction helper function that takes a SendRequest record and constructs a properly formatted raw Bitcoin transaction in hexadecimal format suitable for broadcasting to the Bitcoin network
Implement the getTxId helper function that extracts and returns the transaction ID from a raw Bitcoin transaction in hexadecimal format
Import the Bitcoin base library (mo:base/Bitcoin) and Result library (mo:base/Result) in the backend main actor to support Bitcoin transaction functionality
Define the SendRequest type as a record containing destinationAddress (Text) and amountSatoshis (Nat64) fields in the backend actor
